xrefdescription.para: Child task flags

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: These are optional flags passed to the CFE_ES_CreateChildTask function when creating the CFE child task.

xrefdescription.para: Child task stack size

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Child task stack size passed to the CFE_ES_CreateChildTask function when creating the CFE child task. Stack size is in bytes.

xrefdescription.para: Default telemetry destination IP address

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Default IP address to send the telemetry stream to. This is default only and can be changed by command at runtime.

xrefdescription.para: Default telemetry destination UDP port

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Default UDP port to send the telemetry stream to. This is default only and can be changed by command at runtime.

xrefdescription.para: Message Flow packet limit

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: This is the maximum number of message flow entries that can fit in a message flow diagnostic message.

xrefdescription.para: Maximum message length

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The maximum size that an output telemetry message can be. This is in bytes. If a message exceeds this size, it will be dropped by the classifier.

xrefdescription.para: The UDP channel's CF throttling semaphore name

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Two channels in CF must not have the same semaphore name. This must be unique compared to other channels' throttling semaphores.

xrefdescription.para: The UDP channel's default and maximum value for the CF throttling semaphore

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must not be larger than the TO_DATA_PIPE_DEPTH

xrefdescription.para: Mission specific version number for TO application

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: An application version number consists of four parts: major version number, minor version number, revision number and mission specific revision number. The mission specific revision number is defined here and the other parts are defined in "to_version.h".

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Must be defined as a numeric value that is greater than or equal to zero.

xrefdescription.para: Pipe depth for the Scheduler pipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: Pipe name for the Scheduler pipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

xrefdescription.para: The SB pend behavior type for the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: One of: CFE_SB_POLL, CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, or the number of milliseconds to wait for a new message (recommended). Note, using CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER may cause an unresponsive application if no messages arrive on this pipe.

xrefdescription.para: The number of WAKEUP messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max limited to CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH-1. Note the TO_SCH_PIPE_WAKEUP_RESERVED and TO_SCH_PIPE_SEND_HK_RESERVED must be less than TO_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: The number of SEND_HK messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH. Note the TO_SCH_PIPE_WAKEUP_RESERVED and TO_SCH_PIPE_SEND_HK_RESERVED must be less than TO_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: Pipe depth for the command pipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: Pipe name for the Scheduler pipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

xrefdescription.para: Pipe depth for the data pipe

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH.

xrefdescription.para: The config table default filename

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: The length of each string, including the NULL terminator cannot exceed the #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN value.

detaileddescription.para: Define TO Memory Pool Block Sizes

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: TO Memory Pool Block Sizes

simplesect.title: Limits
simplesect.para: These sizes MUST be increasing and MUST be an integral multiple of 4. The number of block sizes defined cannot exceed CFE_ES_MAX_MEMPOOL_BLOCK_SIZES

xrefdescription.para: Defines the table identification name used for table registration of the configuration table.
Defines the table identification name used for table registration of the dump table.
The timeout value, in milliseconds, to wait for ES application startup sync.

simplesect.title: Limits:
simplesect.para: This parameter must be at least 1000 (ms).

xrefdescription.para: Maximum number of messages to classify per processing frame.
Maximum number of messages to classify per processing frame.
Maximum number configurable channels.

simplesect.title: Description: This is normally set to 1.

xrefdescription.para: Channel output queue depth.

simplesect.title: Description: This defines how many messages can be queued into the
simplesect.para: channel output queue by the scheduler.

xrefdescription.para: Development UDP channel task priority.

simplesect.title: Description: This defines the priority of the development UDP
simplesect.para: child task.

xrefdescription.para: Number of bytes in the Message Memory Pool

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: The message memory pool contains the memory needed for the queued messages packets. The queued messages are dynamically allocated from this pool when the messages are received and queued, and deallocated when messages are transmitted or a new table is loaded.

simplesect.title: Limits
simplesect.para: The Telemetry Output app does not place a limit on this parameter, but there is an overhead cost in the memory pool. The value must be larger than what is needed.
